block.p: Rebecca Baumgold, the daughter of Mary Anne and Harris Baumgold of Snedens Landing, N.Y., was married last evening at her parents' house in Redding, Conn., to Dr. Jonathan Lawrence Prenner, the son of Joyce and Stephen Prenner of Jericho, N.Y. Rabbi David M. Posner officiated.

The bride, 27, is a public relations specialist at the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia. She graduated from Brown University. Her father is the president and her mother is the director of corporate sales at Buzz Baumgold Inc., a Manhattan jewelry business.

Rebecca Baumgold, the daughter of Mary Anne and Harris Baumgold of Snedens Landing, N.Y., was married last evening at her parents' house in Redding, Conn., to Dr. Jonathan Lawrence Prenner, the son of Joyce and Stephen Prenner of Jericho, N.Y. Rabbi David M. Posner officiated.

The bride, 27, is a public relations specialist at the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia. She graduated from Brown University. Her father is the president and her mother is the director of corporate sales at Buzz Baumgold Inc., a Manhattan jewelry business.

The bridegroom, 28, is an ophthalmology resident at the Scheie Eye Institute of the University of Pennsylvania Health System in Philadelphia. He graduated from Penn and received his medical degree from the State University of New York at Stony Brook. His father, who retired as an assistant superintendent of Brooklyn high schools, is now the special projects coordinator at Adelphi University in Garden City, N.Y. The bridegroom's mother is the chairwoman of the social studies department at Francis Lewis High School in Fresh Meadows, Queens.
